[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin](./react-rsbuild-plugin.md) &gt; [CompatVisitorConfig](./react-rsbuild-plugin.compatvisitorconfig.md) &gt; [oldRuntimePkg](./react-rsbuild-plugin.compatvisitorconfig.oldruntimepkg.md)

## CompatVisitorConfig.oldRuntimePkg property

Specifies the list of old runtime package names that need compatibility processing

**Signature:**

```typescript
oldRuntimePkg: Array<string>
```

## Remarks

Default value: `['@lynx-js/react-runtime']`

## Example


```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'
import { pluginReactLynx } from '@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin'

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginReactLynx({
      compat: {
        oldRuntimePkg: ['@my-org/runtime', '@legacy/runtime']
      },
    })
  ],
})
```
